1014200.name: Markerboard Jungle: Frogs
1014200.description:
Starting as a tiny frog egg, the gameplay is from a third-person perspective and includes playing an exploration game as a frog, where you start as a tadpole, explore different areas, chase food, find safe homes to capture, avoid enemies and dangers, and eventually gather other frogs to complete the life cycle.

PLAYABLE FEATURES OF MARKERBOARD JUNGLE: FROGS

  • An exploration game as a Frog. Start as a tadpole, explore the area, chase food, find safe homes to capture, avoid enemies and dangers, and eventually gather other frogs to complete the life cycle.

  • Frog Food: Beetles, Crickets, Houseflys, and Slugs are currently on the menu.

  • Enemies: Sunfish, Sierra Newt, Fence Lizard, Bald Eaglet, Car Tire.

  • Frog Facts and Tadpole Trivia to read as you play.

  • A Journal of frog types from around the world.

  • Earth Mode which lets you change and view accurate settings about the Earth.
1014200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
